name: production-ai-slides
description: Slide decks for Building Production AI Systems course

scripts.diagrams: for f in diagrams/*.mmd; do mmdc -i "$f" -o "${f%.mmd}.svg" -b transparent -w 1100 -H 600; done
scripts.build: npm run diagrams && marp week*/*.md --output dist --pdf --allow-local-files
scripts.export: npm run diagrams && marp week*/*.md --output dist --html --allow-local-files
